name: A Phone Game 1
description:
It is A Phone Game 1

I just wanted to make a totally finished phone game to walk myself through the process of making an app, since it has been a while since I last put anything on the app store. This is the upload just so to archive it on my itch.io page, so all of you wonderful players can also try it, even if you don't have a phone that can play it. :D
